channel.title: Starts on cat ~/differing-opinions.txt > /dev/null
channel.description: Recent content in Starts on cat ~/differing-opinions.txt > /dev/null

item.description: body, html { height: 99%; display: grid; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; font-size: 2em; color: white; } span { margin: auto; } I'm centered! -- var dt = new Date(); document.getElementById("datetime").innerHTML = (("0"+dt.getDate()).slice(-2)) +"."+ (("0"+(dt.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2)) +"."+ (dt.getFullYear()) +" "+ (("0"+dt.getHours()).slice(-2)) +":"+ (("0"+dt.getMinutes()).slice(-2)); var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body"); body[0].style.backgroundColor = "#191818";
